name: Lucky Fox
description:
Lucky Fox is an endless runner that varies in its difficulty and allows the player to improve his character during the games, the player will be able to collect coins and beat his record, show your friends who is the strongest ! 

Touch

  1. - Movement : QD & directional control
  2. - No Collision Power : C

Lucky Fox est un endless runner qui varie dans sa difficulté et permet au joueur d'améliorer son personnage durant les parties, le joueur pourra récupérer des pièces et battre son record, montrer à vos amis qui est le plus fort ! 

  1. - Mouvement : QD & flèche directionnel 
  2. - No Collision Power : C
